title: Drakan: Order of the Flame (Any%) [30:31] (RTA)
description: Wow this game is tough. Thanks to Pafi for the route, the excellent segmented run, and the tutorial. Made a game that would usually be extremely difficult to learn much easier. The tricks in this game are very inconsistent, especially when you don't really know what you're doing. I'll try to get closer to the record.
